biotools.summary: Database that contains information on functional site amino acid positions in the exon structure of encoding gene. It contains BLAST and 3DExonScan programs. BLAST is used for searching sequence similarity between the query protein and polypeptides encoded by single exons stored in it. The 3DExonScan program is used for searching for structural similarity of the given protein with these polypeptides using superimpositions.

bioschemas.name: SitEx
